üóìÔ∏è Session 01 - Introduction, overview and installation

Author

Prof. Dr. Claudius Gr√§bner-Radkowitsch

Published

14 03 2025

Modified

24 02 2025

In this first week, we will cover what you can expect to learn from these exercises and how they differ from the main lecture. I will elaborate a bit on why I chose R for this course, what you can do with it, and what has helped previous participants helped excelling in this course. Finally, I explain a bit what R is, how it relates to R Studio and LaTeX.
